resources.string:
Thank you for taking part in my project! 
 
To continue to the application, please tap the button below to grant the app permission to detect your bluetooth status. 
 
 Please note: 
 
 - The app is NOT able to detect nearby devices: some features require bluetooth to be switched on or off to mock contact tracing functions 
 
 - The app is NOT a real contact tracing app and will NOT track your contacts/position at any time 
 
 - The app does NOT have access to an external database or the Internet: data you input will only be saved on your phone and can be deleted at any time.
Please choose one of the app views
100000 \n cases in your area. \n Danger: red

Protect yourself and your loved ones
\u00b7 Track your contacts and keep safe \n \u00b7 Stay updated with daily figures and data \n \u00b7 Track your symptoms and book tests
Contact tracing is fundamental to stop the spread and end the pandemic. With StopCovid you can take responsibility of your safety and of the containment of Coronavirus.

- Information reported here must be truthful and up-to-date. Reporting false test results will cause fines. 
 
 - Individuals you have been in contact with, however brief, must be notified for their safety 
 
 - You must self-isolate for at least 10 days after a positive Covid test. Leaving home when positive to Coronavirus will cause fines.
Select all the symptoms you feel to keep track of your health.
Symptom Tracker is a tool to monitor your wellbeing and detect signs of Coronavirus prematurely. Use this every day for best results.
